issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

versions.description: Maintenance release with new AMQP support and smaller modules

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
End up getting stack overflow for recursive call in ReflectionUtil.retrieveClassProperties()... if there is a getter that returns itself, it will not check that the "targetObject" which it's inspecting is the same as what an identity getter would return. For example, RedeliveryPolicy has a method:

getValue() {
return this;
}

which causes this stack trace:

java.lang.StackOverflowError

	at java.io.FileOutputStream.write(FileOutputStream.java:282)

fields.summary: activemq-perf-maven-plugin is unusable because of bug in ReflectionUtil helper class

comments.body: Double check your commit, looks like you might have commented out the fix ;)

Yep! Nice catch!

Fix with r1441277
